column1: 17236,Super-Villain Team-Up/Modok's 11 (2007) #5,5,12439,170,"A.I.M. at last unleashes the full fury of the Ultra-Adaptoid against what remains of M.O.D.O.K.'s team. How can our ragtag gang of crooks possibly stand against a foe with the assembled powers of practically every hero in the Marvel Universe? ",
